title: Spring Game Jam
description:
Team up with local creators and make a game over a few weekends (and the week in between)! This jam will be mostly virtual. SIGN UP ON ITCH.IO!

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307433670/

title: Game Club: Baba Is You
description:
Game Club is like a book club except we pick a game to play each month and then meet up to discuss it with a focus on game design. This month's game is Baba Is You, a brilliant puzzle game! Come share your thoughts on the game with us!

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307697799/
location: QDOBA Mexican Eats, 766 N New Ballas Rd, Creve Coeur, MO 63141, USA

title: Spring Jam Work Session 2
description:
The Spring Game Jam is virtual, but we decided to have an in-person get together anyway. Come hang out with fellow jammers and work on your games at the library! We will be in Meeting Room 2.

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307824136/
location: St. Louis County Library Grand Glaize Branch  - 1010 Meramec Station Rd - Manchester, MO, us

title: Spring Jam Game Demos
description: Spring Jam game demos will be streamed live online on our Twitch channel

title: Share & Play
description:
Join us for casual game testing! This is an opportunity for developers to share their progress, observe playtesting, and get feedback on their projects, and for local game enthusiasts to get their hands on new games, prototypes, and give helpful feedback. We will be in Meeting Room 2 in the library.

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307697634/
location: St. Louis County Library–Grand Glaize Branch, 1010 Meramec Station Road, Manchester, MO 63021, USA
